danfulea.phys

Class Alpha_MC

  • java.lang.Object
    • danfulea.phys.Alpha_MC

  • public class Alpha_MC
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class for Monte-Carlo calculation of alpha detector efficiency.
    Results are accurate ONLY for vacuum based alpha detector systems!!
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 05 APR. 2011

    • Constructor Detail

      • Alpha_MC

        public Alpha_MC(double DISTZ,
                double asource,
                double adet,
                int NCASE)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        DISTZ - source to detector distance in cm.
        asource - source diameter in cm
        adet - detector diameter in cm
        NCASE - number of simulations (histories)
